thread.title: Great 'Monopoly Board' location
thread.title_full: Great 'Monopoly Board' location - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, Trafalgar Square, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: gbellDX
title: Great 'Monopoly Board' location
text: First time stayer for one night. I spend many nights in London but this was my first stay in this locale and hotel is ideally situated. Room was spotless and spacious. The place has a sort of gentlemen's club ambience, dark wood and masculine decor - not sure if that's the impression they want to create but it works well. I didn't eat in the hotel so can't comment on the quality of the dining. Price was very good value considering the location. I would certainly stay here again and recommend it to others.
